Assignment.AssignmentText:
Hello!
For this assignment, you will be creating a product overview page using HTML and CSS. The page should contain a template for a product, which includes product details such as name, description, and price. You should use the GRID design pattern with FLEX where necessary to create a clean and organized layout.
Here are the steps you can follow to complete this assignment:
1. Create a new HTML file and give it a descriptive name such as "product-overview.html". 2. Inside the <body> tag, create a <div> to contain the product template. Give it a class name such as "product-template". 3. Within the "product-template" <div>, create <div>s for each piece of product information, such as name, description, and price. Give each <div> a class name such as "product-name", "product-description", and "product-price". 4. Use CSS to style the "product-template" <div> and its child <div>s using the GRID design pattern. Use FLEX where necessary to create a clean and organized layout. 5. Use CSS to style the individual product information <div>s, such as font size, color, and alignment. 6. Repeat steps 2-5 for each product you want to display on the page. 7. Save your HTML and CSS files and open the HTML file in a web browser to test that the product overview page displays correctly.
Here are some resources to help you with this assignment:
- A guide to the GRID design pattern: https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/complete-guide-grid/ - A guide to using FLEX: https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/a-guide-to-flexbox/ - W3Schools HTML tutorial: https://www.w3schools.com/html/ - W3Schools CSS tutorial: https://www.w3schools.com/css/
Good luck with your assignment! Let me know if you have any questions.
